name: Death Dweller
description:
Destroy the suspicious box and discover what dastardly ghouls hide inside.

Made for GBJam 7.

Follow me on twitter for art/game dev updates!
https://twitter.com/illdie314

CONTROLS:
A: (KB - Z/C) (Gamepad - Right Face) - Shoot/Confirm
B: (KB - X) (Gamepad - Bottom Face) - Focus/Cancel
D-Pad: (KB - Arrow Keys) (Gamepad - L Stick/D-Pad) - Move
Start: (KB - Escape) (Gamepad - Start) - Pause
Select: (KB - F4) (Gamepad - Back/Select) - Change Screen Size

HOLD to SHOOT
TAP to MELEE
